## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 20,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | To cover forecasted demand, buffer for potential variability, and achieve a 5-day supply with minimal excess stock.  |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | 8,000 units higher than the player's planned purchase.  |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 3.7 days                                  |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5 days                                    |
| Comments                          |  This order size utilizes two 10,000 unit orders to maintain a healthy inventory level, ensuring adequate supply and minimizing the risk of stockouts while minimizing excess inventory.   |
